title: Sources: Giants, Adames agree on 7 years, $182M
description: The San Francisco Giants and shortstop Willy Adames are in agreement on a seven-year, $182 million deal, sources told ESPN.
author: Jeff Passan

title: LA Galaxy hold off Red Bulls to win 6th MLS Cup
description: CARSON, California -- Goals from Joseph Painstil and Dejan Joveljic extended the LA Galaxy's league-leading tally of MLS Cup titles to six with a 2-1 victory over the visiting New York Red Bulls.
author: Cesar Hernandez

title: West Ham striker Antonio 'stable' after car crash
description: West Ham say striker Michail Antonio is in a stable condition and "conscious and communicating" after a car crash.

title: Amorim's task to improve 'mediocre Man Utd'
description: Ruben Amorim's task of improving Manchester United's fortunes is becoming clear to him after a defeat by Nottingham Forest.

title: Bulldogs claim SEC title with OT comeback over Longhorns
description: Georgia won with its backup QB, a bullying defense and a Trevor Etienne 4-yard TD run to close out Texas and earn a first-round bye in the CFP.
author: Yahoo Sports

title: Azeez Al-Shaair's history of violations surfaces
description: When the NFL announced its three-game suspension of Texans linebacker Azeez Al-Shaair, the league made general reference to his â€œmultiple offenses for personal fouls and sportsmanship-related rules violations in recent seasons."
author: ProFootball Talk on NBC Sports

title: 'The data showed this' - how to hurt Man City
description: Crystal Palace handed Manchester City another title-race setback at Selhurst Park on Saturday with a 2-2 draw and afterwards boss Oliver Glasner explained how he picked out weaknesses in the defending champions' game.

title: New Zealand vs England: Live commentary and scorecard
description: Ball-by-ball updates and latest score from Wellington as England look to clinch a series victory over New Zealand by winning the second Test.
